Verses: 1 aagaabukku Samaariyaavile Ezhubadhu Kumaarar Irundhapadiyinaal, Yegoo Samaariyaavilirukkira Yesrayelin Prabukkalaagiya Moopparidaththukkum, Aagaabudaiya Pillaigalai Valarkkiravargalidaththukkum Nirubangalai Ezhudhiyanuppinaan.
2 adhil: Ungal Aandavanudaiya Kumaarargal Ungalodirukkiraargale; Radhangalum, Kudhiraigalum, Aranaana Pattanamum Aayudhangalum Ungalukku Unde.

3 ippodhum Indha Nirubam Ungalidaththil Varumpodhu Neengal Ungal Aandavanudaiya Kumaararil Uththamamum Semmaiyumaayirukkiravanaip Paarththu, Avanai Avan Thagappanudaiya Singaasanaththinmel Vaiththu, Ungal Aandavanudaiya Kudumbaththukkaaga Yuththampannungal Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu:
4 avargal Migavum Bayandhu: Idho, Irandu Raajaakkal Avanukku Munbaaga Nirkavillaiye; Naangal Eppadi Nirpom Endraargal.

5 aagaiyaal Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranum, Nagara Visaarippukkaaranum, Moopparum, Pillaigalin Visaarippukkaararum: Naangal Umadhu Adiyaargal, Neer Engalukku Solvadhaiyellaam Seyvom; Naangal Oruvaraiyum Raajaavaakkuvadhillai; Umadhu Paarvaikku Sammadhiyaanadhai Seyyum Endru Yegoovukku Solliyanuppinaargal.

6 appozhudhu Avan: Avargalukku Irandaam Nirubaththai Ezhudhinaan; Adhil: Neengal En Patchaththil Serndhu En Sollaik Ketpeergalaanaal, Ungal Aandavanudaiya Kumaaranin Thalaigalai Vaangi, Naalai Inneraththil Yesrayelukku Ennidaththil Vaarungal Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu. Raajaavin Kumaararaagiya Ezhubadhuperum Thangalai Valarkkira Pattanaththin Periya Manusharodu Irundhaargal.

7 indha Nirubam Avargalidaththil Vandhapodhu, Avargal Raajaavin Kumaararaagiya Ezhubadhuperaiyum Pidiththu Vetti, Avargal Thalaigalaik Koodaigalil Vaiththu, Yesrayelilirukkira Avanidaththirku Anuppinaargal.

8 anuppappatta Aal Vandhu: Raajakumaararin Thalaigalaik Konduvandhaargal Endru Avanukku Ariviththapodhu, Avan Vidiyarkaalamattum Avaigalai Olimugavaasalil Irandu Kuviyalaagak Kuviththu Vaiyungal Endraan.

9 marunaal Kaalame Avan Veliye Vandhu Nindru, Sagala Janangalaiyum Nokki: Neengal Needhimaangalallavaa? Idho, En Aandavanukku Virodhamaagak Kattuppaadupanni Avanaik Kondrupottene; Aanaalum Ivargal Ellaaraiyum Kondravan Yaar?

10 aadhalaal Karththar Aagaabin Kudumbaththaarukku Virodhamaaga Sonna Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalil Ondrum Tharaiyile Vizhavillai Enbadhai Arindhukollungal; Karththar Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Eliyaavaikkondu Sonnadhai Seydhaar Endraan.

11 yesrayelilum Aagaabin Kudumbaththaaril Meedhiyaana Yaavaraiyum, Avanukku Irundha Ellaa Mandhirigalaiyum, Avanaichcherndha Manusharaiyum, Avanudaiya Aasaariyargalaiyum, Avanukku Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaadhapadikku Yegoo Kondrupottaan.
12 pinbu Avan Ezhundhu Samaariyaavukkup Pogap Purappattaan; Vazhiyile Avan Aattumayir Kaththarikkira Meypparin Oor Irukkum Idaththukku Vandhapodhu,

13 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Agasiyaavin Sagodhararai Ange Kandu, Neengal Yaar Endru Kettaan. Avargal: Naangal Agasiyaavin Sagodharar; Naangal Raajaavin Pillaigalaiyum Raajasthreeyin Pillaigalaiyum Vinavugiradharkup Pogirom Endraargal.

14 appozhudhu Avan: Ivargalai Uyirode Pidiyungal Endraan; Avargalai Uyirode Pidiththu, Naarpaththirandu Pergalaagiya Avargalai Aattumayir Kaththarikkira Thuravandaiyile Vettip Pottaargal; Avargalil Oruvanaiyum Avan Meedhiyaaga Vidavillai.

15 avan Avvidam Vittup Purappatta Podhu, Thanakku Edhirppatta Rekaabin Kumaaranaagiya Yonadhaabai Sandhiththu, Avanai Ubasariththu: En Irudhayam Un Irudhayaththode Semmaiyaai Irukkiradhupola Un Irudhayamum Semmaiyaayirukkiradhaa Endru Kettaan. Adharku Yonadhaap: Appadiye Irukkiradhu Endraan; Appadiyirukkiradhaanaal, Un Kaiyaith Thaa Endru Sonnaan; Avan Than Kaiyaik Koduththapodhu, Avanaith Thannidaththil Radhaththinmel Erivara Solli,
16 nee Ennode Koodavandhu Karththarukkaaga Enakku Irukkira Bakthivairaakkiyaththaip Paar Endraan; Appadiye Ivanai Avan Radhaththinmel Etrinaargal.
17 avan Samaariyaavukku Vandhapodhu, Karththar Eliyaavode Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Samaariyaavil Aagaabukku Meedhiyaana Yaavaraiyum Azhiththuth Theerumalavum Sangaarancheydhaan.
18 pinbu Yegoo Janangalaiyellaam Kootti, Avargalai Nokki: Aagaab Paagaalai Seviththadhu Konjam, Yegoo Avanai Sevippadhu Migudhi.

19 ippodhum Paagaalin Sagala Theerkkadharisigalaiyum, Avanudaiya Sagala Panividaik Kaararaiyum, Avanudaiya Sagala Aasaariyaraiyum Ennidaththil Azhaippiyungal; Oruvanum Kuraiyalaagaadhu; Naan Paagaalukkup Periya Baliyidappogiren; Varaadhavan Evano Avan Uyirodiruppadhillai Endraan; Paagaalin Panividaikkaararai Azhikkumpadi Yegoo Idhaith Thandhiramaai Seydhaan.
20 paagaalukkup Pandigaiyin Aasarippaik Koorungal Endru Yegoo Sonnaan; Appadiye Koorinaargal.

21 yegoo Isravel Dhesamengum Adhai Solliyanuppinapadiyinaal, Paagaalin Panividaikkaarar Ellaarum Vandhaargal; Varaadhavan Oruvanumillai; Avargal Paagaalin Kovilukkul Pravesiththadhinaal Paagaalin Kovil Naarsaariyum Niraindhirundhadhu.
22 appozhudhu Avan, Vasthirasaalai Visaarippukkaaranai Nokki: Paagaalin Panividaikkaararukkellaam Vasthirangalai Eduththukkonduvaa Endraan; Avargalukku Vasthirangalai Eduththukkonduvandhaan.

23 pinbu Yegoo: Rekaabin Kumaaranaagiya Yonadhaapodunkoodap Paagaalin Kovilukkul Pravesiththu, Paagaalin Panividaikkaararai Nokki: Paagaalin Oozhiyakkaararai Allaamal Karththarin Oozhiyakkaararil Oruvarum Inge Ungalodu Iraadhapadikkuth Thittamaaip Paarungal Endraan.

24 avargal Baligalaiyum Sarvaanga Thaganangalaiyum Seluththa Utpravesiththa Pinbu, Yegoo Veliyile Enbadhu Peraith Thanakku Aayaththamaaga Vaiththu: Naan Ungal Kaiyil Oppuvikkira Manusharil Oruvanai Evan Thappavidugiraano Avanudaiya Jeevanukkup Padhilaaga Avanaith Thappavittavanudaiya Jeevan Eedaayirukkum Endraan.

25 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyittuth Theerndha Podhu, Yegoo Sevagaraiyum Servaikkaararaiyum Nokki: Ullepoi, Avargalai Vettippodungal; Oruvaraiyum Veliye Vidavendaam Endraan; Appadiye Pattayakkarukkinaal Sevagarum Servaikkaararum Avargalai Vetti Erindhupottu, Paagaal Kovilai Serndha Sthalam Engumpoi,
26 paagaal Kovil Vikkiragangalai Veliye Eduththuvandhu, Avaigalaith Theekkoluththi,
27 paagaalin Silaiyaith Thagarththu, Paagaalin Kovilai Idiththu, Adhai Innaalvaraikkum Irukkiradhupola Malajalaadhi Idamaakkinaargal.
28 ippadiye Yegoo Paagaalai Isravelil Iraadhapadikku Azhiththuppottaan.
29 aanaalum Beththelilum Thaanilum Vaiththa Porkandrukkuttigalaal, Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Paavangalai Yegoo Vittu Vilagavillai.

30 karththar Yegoovai Nokki: En Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Nee Nandraai Seydhu, En Irudhayaththil Irundhapadiyellaam Aagaabin Kudumbaththukku Seydhapadiyinaal, Un Kumaarar Israveludaiya Singaasanaththinmel Naalu Thalaimuraiyaaga Veetriruppaargal Endraar.

31 aanaalum Yegoo Isravelin Dhevanudaiya Karththarin Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi Than Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Nadakkak Kavalaippadavillai; Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Yerobeyaamin Paavangalai Vittu Avan Vilagavum Illai.
32 annaatkal Mudhal Karththar Isravelaik Kuraindhupogappanninaar; Aasagel Avargalai Isravelin Ellaigalilellaam Muriya Adiththu,

33 yordhaan Thuvakkik Kizhakkilulla Arnon Nadhikku Sameebamaana Aarover Mudharkondirukkira Keeleyaaththilum Paasaanilumulla Kaadhiyar, Roobeniyar, Manaaseyar Ivargaludaiya Dhesamaagiya Keeleyaadh Muzhuvadhaiyum Muriya Adiththaan.
34 yegoovin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Avanudaiya Ellaa Vallamaiyum Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
35 yegoo Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avanai Samaariyaavil Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Sthaanaththil Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yovaagaas Raajaavaanaan.
36 yegoo Samaariyaavile Isravelinmel Raajyabaarampannina Naatkal Irubaththettu Varusham.
